Package com.EMS._abstract

Interface BaseOrganization

  • public interface BaseOrganization

    BaseOrganization Interface

    Interface for API class Organization.

    Note: Only meant for API use. Must not be used by end user!

    Since:
    2019-11-5

      • setNumEmployees

        void setNumEmployees​(int numEmployees)
        Set the number of employees in the organization.
        Parameters:
        numEmployees - number of employees in the organization.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a negative number is passed as argument.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the new size is less than number of appointed employees.

      • getNumEmployees

        int getNumEmployees()
        Get the number of employees in the organization.
        Returns:
        number of employees in the organization.

      • setDateOfEstablishment

        void setDateOfEstablishment​(java.lang.String date,
                            java.lang.String format)
        Set the date of establishment of the organization. Format: All supported formats of Date.
        Parameters:
        date - date of establishment.
        format - format of passed date.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the format validation fails.
        See Also:
        Date

      • getDateOfEstablishment

        Get the date of establishment of the organization.
        Returns:
        date of establishment.
        See Also:
        Date

      • setEmployeeDetails

        void setEmployeeDetails​(com.EMS.core.Employee emp)
        Set the details of the appointed employee. Details of all the employees are stored in an array.
        Parameters:
        emp - Appointed employee.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If no vacant seats are present.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the array is not initialized by calling the method setNumEmployees
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If employee with same id exists.

      • getEmployeeDetails

        com.EMS.core.Employee[] getEmployeeDetails()
        Get the array of appointed employees. Note: The array may not be fully initialized.
        Returns:
        array of appointed employee.

      • pPrint

        void pPrint​(boolean print_employee_det)
        Pretty print the details of the employee.
        Parameters:
        print_employee_det - boolean indicating weather or not to print employee details.
